tool_description: Analyzes historical performance trends over time to identify patterns, improvements, or declining performance in agent metrics.

agent_id.description: Agent ID to analyze trends for

metric_name.description: Performance metric to analyze trends for

trend_period.description: Time period for trend analysis (weekly, monthly, quarterly)

historical_months.description: Number of months of historical data to include (1-24)

trend_sensitivity.description: Sensitivity level for trend detection (low, medium, high)

error_messages: Invalid agent ID: The specified agent ID does not exist in historical records.
Invalid metric name: Use supported metrics like 'handle_time', 'quality_score', 'resolution_rate'.
Invalid trend period: Use 'weekly', 'monthly', or 'quarterly' for trend analysis.
Invalid historical months: Specify between 1 and 24 months for historical data range.
Invalid sensitivity level: Use 'low', 'medium', or 'high' for trend sensitivity.
Insufficient historical data: Not enough historical data points for meaningful trend analysis.
usage: Provide agent_id, metric_name, and trend_period as required parameters. Optionally set historical_months and trend_sensitivity to customize the analysis depth and detection sensitivity.

trend_strength.description: Strength of the trend from 0 (no trend) to 1 (strong trend)

data_points.description: Number of data points used in trend analysis

trend_summary.description: Textual summary of the trend analysis findings

seasonal_patterns.description: Identified seasonal or cyclical patterns in performance
